summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Dedicated Electrical Engineer with over 3.5 years of specialized experience in maintenance operations within the pharmaceutical manufacturing industry. Proficient in electrical system design, PLC programming, and power system protection. Committed to applying technical expertise in competitive environments to drive innovation and operational excellence. Seeking opportunities to leverage my skills in electrical engineering to contribute to challenging projects and further develop my professional capabilities.

items.title: Electrical Maintenance Engineer
items.company: STAR PLUSE Pharma - Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company
tasks: Review and optimize electrical distribution drawings and plans for the company's facilities
Supervise electrical works execution and manage handover processes
Install, operate, maintain, and upgrade production machines while conducting SAT, FAT, OQ, and OP tests
Develop and implement comprehensive maintenance plans and documentation
Provide technical mentorship to university engineering students during internships
Operate and synchronize generators using DeepSee program
Design, install, and operate PV systems for energy efficiency

items.title: Trainee
tasks: Received hands-on training in power station operations and maintenance

engineering.title: Engineering Capabilities
items: Electrical network design using MATLAB and Ecodial
